body.p: This topic contains tests of the different ways to embed or refer to SVG graphics as well as references to SVG graphics that exercise different SVG features.

fig.title: SVG Reference to an SVG element within a larger XML file
fig.desc: viewBox specified, no width or height specified (should scale up to fit available space).

fig.title: SVG Reference key reference to key "svg-graphic-02"
fig.desc: viewBox not specified, no width or height specified. Should not be scaled up (internal units interpreted as pixels).

fig.title: SVG With Image Specified as data:image URI
fig.desc: This graphic includes animation and a bitmap image encoded within the href attribute as base-64-encoded data using the data: URN scheme.
